attributes.action: Get Pro Clubs on Fifa 15 for Xbox 360
attributes.additional_details: EA has viciously removed the Pro Clubs feature from the latest edition of Fifa 15 on Xbox 360, yet maintaining it for Xbox One. We demand that Pro Clubs is added in order to ensure a generation of clubbers may continue searching for the elusive Division 1 title or EA Shield. Show a bit of clemency EA!
